name: Farosh Chicken Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Farosh Chicken Recipe: Chicken whole with skin 1 White pepper ½ tsp Black pepper ½ tsp Paprika 1 tsp heaped Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Lemon juice 4 tbsp Salt 1½ tsp Oil ½ cup for brushing
instructions: Marinate chicken with all the given ingredients for at least 2 hours Place in an oven tray and bake in a pre-heated oven on 180 D for 45 mins Keep pouring 1 tbsp oil on top of the chicken after every 10 mins Cook till chicken tender and brown. Serve with french fries.
